title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5301.8 - Award and duration of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5301.8 - Award and duration of license

State Regulations
(a) The
date of award of a gaming facility license shall be deemed to have occurred
upon a public determination by the commission to issue a license to an
applicant. (b) A license shall be
issued by the commission for an initial 10-year period and shall be renewable
thereafter for a period of at least 10 years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5301.8

Adopted

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
